body.name: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Moisturizer 3.52oz/ 100g, Daily Repair Face Gel Cream for Dry, Sensitive Skin, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, No Phthalates, Korean Skincare
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 12 hrs 7 mins
features: Long-lasting Hydration: Infused with 92% of snail mucin (also called Snail Secretion Filtrate), this cream builds a moisture barrier to plump, hydrate, and soothes skin. This everyday multi-solution cream glides onto the skin and revives skin radiance.

Supercharged Repairing Moisturizer: A light-weight, gel-type cream repairs and soothes irritated, sensitized skin after breakouts like rosacea. This cream moisturizer is powered by snail mucin, hyaluronic acid, and betaine to strengthen the skin barrier by replenishing moisture.

Key Ingredient: Snail Secretion Filtrate contains "Mucin"- an EFFECTIVE ingredient for enhanced moisturization. It instantly soothes damaged skin and delivers moisture deep into your skin. Perfect for dehydrated and damaged skin.

NO Snails are Harmed: Snail Mucin is obtained in a safe and environmentally friendly way in a favorite environment of snails and then processed as a cosmetic material. 100% Natural, Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist-tested.

COSRX Standards: All COSRX products are formulated with skin-friendly ingredients that alleviate irritated skin. Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist tested, Animal Testing-FREE, Parabens-FREE, Sulfates-FREE, Phthalates-FREE

Our Brand Story COSRX believes that cosmetics should give more than just outward beauty. We are devoted to enabling individuals to find solutions according to their personal skin conditions. We strive to help our customers gain self-confidence, and ultimately find their own unique beauty inside. Featured in COSRX has been featured in multiple prominent magazines and our products have received praise from many trusted editors. As proven by the countless articles that have been released, COSRX will continue to listen to the voices of our customers and strive to improve.

How is Snail Mucin obtained? Snail Mucin is obtained through placing snails in a dark and quiet environment for 30 minutes, then transferring them back to their homes. Snail Mucin is then collected and processed for cosmetic use. No snails are harmed in the process. Can this be used on sensitive skin? Based on the Skin Irritation Test (on 34 women for 48 hours), and the Human Repeat Insult Patch Test (on 53 men and women aged from 18-59), the Snail 96 Mucin Essence can be used on sensitive skin. All How do I know if this product is authentic?​ To ensure the authenticity of the product, please make sure you are purchasing the product from the only authorized seller: COSRX Inc. ​The authenticity of the product cannot be promised when purchased from sellers other than COSRX Inc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A PLUS for sensitive skin (older women especially)
reviews.reviewText: I am pleasantly surprised by this product. I am 50 yrs young, going through perimenopause and my facial tone has seen better days.Ok so We all know that stress. Environmental elements can affect your physical, mental, emotional health, especially aging women that don't take care of their older skin. You if don't take care of yourself.I have tried pretty much every skin care regimen that a woman can possibly try. As stated above, I am 50 years old. I still have breakouts from time to time. I have broken red capillaries on my face. I have large poors. I have wrinkles. Don't get me started on finding a great foundation. I haven't found that yet but anyways. I ordered this product and I was not for sure about what to expect just by the pure name of it. LOL but I ordered it along with a couple of the other skin care products from the same brand. And I immediately washed my face and used my little shaver to exfoliate and get rid of the fuzzies and applied everything that I bought including this product and my face felt immediately 10 times better, it was almost kind of instant the redness went away. The appearance of my pores was very minimal. My face looked shiny, kinda rejuvenated. It's not oily, it's really slick. It's very viscous, slimy consistency. There is no smell, it's not grainy, it is whitish in color goes on clear rubs right in it takes a minute for it to dry on your face so it's kind of I wanna say tacky, but after it dries on your face, it feels really smooth and it's almost kinda like it tightens your face when it dries, so that was kind of a nice effect. So when it dries on your face and it tightens like it did, I almost felt like it tightened the pores on my face. So that was a good indication that it was kind of smoothing out the appearance of the large pores that I have.Overall, I would suggest buying this despite the weirdness of it. It's good I have extremely sensitive skin. I have T zone area so I'm part dry part oily. I get a bit of psoriasis or eczema behind my ears or whatever and around my nose and my laugh lines are super sensitive to different products, especially Vitamin C products which I will never buy again. But my face gets Super dry and flaky. And this product did not do that at all. No burn effect either. Exceeded my expectations overall. I'm very happy with my purchase and I will leave reviews for the other products that I bought from this brand on the other pages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Balanced Review
reviews.reviewText: This is an intriguing skincare product, boasting snail mucin as a key ingredient known for its healing and moisturizing properties. Upon application, the cream has a notable lightweight texture, making it suitable for various skin types, including sensitive skin. It absorbs well without leaving a greasy residue, providing a soothing and hydrating effect.However, users with extremely oily or acne-prone skin might need to be cautious, as the rich formulation could potentially lead to breakouts. It's fragrance-free, which is a plus for those sensitive to scents.In terms of hydration and skin repair, this cream shows promising results, especially in improving skin texture and moisture levels. The packaging is practical and hygienic, although some might prefer a more luxurious design.Overall, it's is a solid choice for those seeking deep hydration and skin repair, offering good value for its price. As with any skincare product, results may vary depending on individual skin types and conditions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Yes to moisture! Yes to virtually no smell! Again, yes to moisture. Did I mention this is a great moisturizer? Leaves me all dewy and glowing. LOVE. IT.For those who complained about the “slimy” texture…it is snail mucin and to be expected. If you think this will gross you out, I don’t encourage you try it. It’s more like mozzarella cheese in my mind than anything. Super stringy, heavy to the touch, but so lightweight on the face. Non greasy. I read some felt it was sticky. I don’t get that at all as it absorbs so well but still leaves you glowing and soft feeling. I also read some felt it was sticky. I did not get that at all as it absorbs amazingly but leaves me flowing and my face softer to the touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It was okay not the best I have ever used.
reviews.reviewText: The COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Moisturizer has garnered significant attention in the skincare community, and while it delivers decent hydration, it falls short in a few key aspects, warranting a three-star rating.On the positive side, the lightweight and gel-like texture of this moisturizer is a pleasant surprise. It absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving a non-greasy finish, making it suitable for both morning and evening use. The hydration it provides is notable, giving the skin a plump and dewy appearance.The star ingredient, snail mucin, is known for its potential skin-renewing and soothing properties. After consistent use, I did observe a subtle improvement in the overall texture of my skin and a reduction in redness. However, the transformative effects were not as pronounced as I had hoped for, considering the hype surrounding snail mucin in skincare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was kind of skeptical about this product, but I have heard quite a few people using it so I wanted to give it a try. To my surprise, it has left my skin, Super smooth, super soft and very hydrated. My make up lays very smoothly as well. I use it day and night and definitely recommend it. It does not have a smell. The consistency is kind of a slimy sticky (i know sounds kinda gross) but it dries right on the face quickly and easily and doesn’t leave a sticky residue. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does wonders for my skin
reviews.reviewText: Absorbs very well and no break outs or negative reactions. Works well with makeup products so there's no worries about foundation pilling. There is no smell to it so that's always a plus. It is a little runny but that's because I'm sure of the small mucin. Very satisfied.

Tenía muchas expectativas del producto ya que es coreano y vi muchas reseñas.Y sin duda, es lo mejor que he probado, mi piel es sensible con tendencia mixta-grasa, los primeros cambios que vi es que no irrita la piel para nada, no es pesada al contrario, la textura es muy ligera y sin duda, súper hidratante para mi piel. De hecho hasta se redujo muchísimo el brillo producido por la grasa que produce mi piel. Además, disminuyeron considerablemente la aparición de granitos y por supuesto, los poros. ¡Lo recomiendo sin duda, es una maravilla!
My skin after it so soft and watered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how it feels on my face,on my second cup now,though it dries off quickly,people say my face is quite shiny and fine,I believe it’s because of this moisturizer.
Mia moglie ha già recensito la essence, la crema è anche meglio. Il top contro le macchie dell'età e solari

Me llegó al día siguiente y al probarla me sorprendió la textura !! Es diferente, sin embargo se absorbe con facilidad , tengo la piel seca y con manchas , con tan solo una aplicación ya notas algo diferente , luminosidad …. hidratación!! Me ha gustado mucho !! Para las manchas tendremos que esperar ….Calidad precio , perfecta ! Me he quedado con ganas de probar más productos de esta marca !
